title: Bug Report
body: While checking out some of the new profile features and additions in queue, I was looking at diana's champion information when queue popped. Upon accepting queue, it pulled me into champion select, but left dianas information page open too. It was closable but surely it shouldn't have stayed open when joining champ select.

replies.body:
Hey there!

This is a known issue we want to fix. It can happen with other screens like Profile as well in some situations. :)
